about_the_game:
The goal of the operation is simple. Grab the money and escape with your full limbs

.
Through a special route, in exchange for an advance charge, you have granted access to a specific strange phenomenon control area.
Break into the abandoned house with your friends, grab the money and goods, and complete the "job" successfully.

Once you have collected enough stuff, pack everything into a truck and get out as soon as possible.
Be as quiet and quick. Because this is a specific strange phenomenon control area.

Once you've made it out, don't forget to check the number of people. One person missing? One more? Don't worry about the details!
But get one thing in mind.

Don't get to live there permanently.

  • Stealth action as you avoid ghosts and collect money and goods scattered around the map.
  • Ghosts can be seen through surveillance cameras.
  • No jumpscares with loud noises.
  • Strategic chases with the ghost's own actions and jittery chases when the ghost finds you.

content_descriptors.notes: Corpses, bloodstains, and extremities are placed on the stage. Unsanitary medical equipment is also placed on the abandoned hospital stage. In addition, ghosts have a fear-inducing and grotesque appearance, and whenever ghosts appear, they are accompanied by a psychological portrayal of fear. During the game, players may see the corpses of other players.
